PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-07532015-06-04HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActTobacco Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Schedule to the Tobacco Act
PrecisOrder Amending the SCHEDULE TO THE TOBACCO ACT in order to (1) protect young persons from inducements to use tobacco products by further limiting the availability of flavoured cigar types that are attractive to youth; and (2) remove the ability of the tobacco industry to market most flavoured cigars in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0126 Publication Date: 2015-06-17
AttachmentsAttachment
